text: Inhibition of NF-AT signal transduction events by a dominant - negative form of calcineurin .

An inhibitory , " dominant - negative , " form of the <extra_id_0> calcineurin catalytic (A) subunit <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was prepared , which lacks the <extra_id_0> calmodulin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - binding domain , autoinhibitory domain and most of its catalytic core but possesses the <extra_id_0> regulatory (B) subunit <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> binding domain .
